full_summary:
----------------
## Purchase of a Medium Freeze Dryer
### Solicitation Number: 01B46-23-168
#### Publication Date: November 10, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date: December 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

#### Solicitation Overview

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's (AAFC) Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre intends to acquire a medium freeze dryer to replace an existing unit. The proposed freeze dryer must be capable of meeting the analytical needs of research projects in the agriculture and food sector.

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Start Date**: November 28, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada, Quebec (except NCR)

#### Tender Requirements

* The proposed freeze dryer must be capable of meeting the analytical needs of research projects in the agriculture and food sector.
* The bidder must provide a detailed technical proposal outlining the freeze dryer's specifications, performance, and maintenance requirements.
* The bidder must also provide a price quotation, including all applicable taxes and duties.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* The tender will be evaluated based on the bidder's ability to meet the technical requirements and provide the best price.

#### Contact Information

For more information regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Marie-Pier Parent
marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca
(506) 531-7263

#### Supporting Documents

The tender documents, including the solicitation notice and technical specifications, are available for download at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24464/npp-apm-01b46-23-168.pdf
